workshoptitle: Set up Centralized and Automated Patching to Keep Databases Secure and Compliant

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Automated Database Patching at Scale with Fleet Maintenance UI
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the UI needed with Fleet Maintenance to automate patching of wide range of DB Configurations including Oracle RAC environments with Data Guard Standby
